name: KARLSON
description:
Karlson is an intriguing First Person Shooter, combing both parkour & classic FPS mechanics, for an immersive and fun experience.


There is a big emphasis on movement, with maps designed around smooth and fun jumps & tricks. Each map is designed to keep both speed & flow in tact! The in-game timer will keep track of your time for each map, so you can work on getting faster and faster.
